Hero.title: Hello, I'm Zulfian Hamzah!
Hero.description: Web and app development are my passion, and my name is Muhammad Zulfian. I started with a strong foundation and continuously hone my skills in both fields. My education in Informatics complements the real-world experience from various projects I've worked on, driving me to always create diverse and innovative solutions.

About.title: About Me
About.description1: I'm a developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I'm proficient in mobile application development using Flutter and Dart, and have a solid understanding of SQL. For web development, I'm accustomed to using React.js and Node.js to build interactive user interfaces and scalable APIs. I'm also capable of developing native Android applications and am enthusiastic about mastering advanced concepts like responsive design, animations, state management, and full-stack integration.
About.description2: I'm experienced in using Visual Studio Code, Android Studio, Git, and npm. As a collaborative individual, I'm always open to learning and contributing to innovative projects, committed to continuous self-improvement, and ready to face challenges in creating effective and modern digital solutions in the future.
About.cardFrontendDesc: Build responsive, interactive UI using modern frameworks.
About.cardBackendDesc: Design robust APIs, database schemas, and server logic.
About.cardUiDesc: Craft intuitive interfaces with user-centered design principles.
About.cardMobileDesc: Develop cross-platform apps with native performance.
